full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON DKAR 'GREL PA BKA' RGYA MA BZHUGS PA 'DI LTA BA'I DUS SU MGON PO DANG GNOD SBYIN KshI TRA PA LA DANG 'KHOR BZHI DANG CHOS SKOR RNAMS PA GTOR MA PHUL GZHI BDAG LA GSER SKYEMS PHUL NAS BLTAS NA DNGOS GRUB THOB PO BKRA SHIS, ,

DANG LDAN ZHING PA'I STENG, DNGOS GRUB CHU 'DZIN STUG POS KHEBS LAS RGYUN MI 'CHAD PAR BYIN CHEN CHAR RGYUN RAB BSIL DGE TSOGS, @041A *, ,RNAL 'BYOR SGYU 'PHRUL MDONGS LDAN DGA' BSKYED DAL BUS SGROG CING DE DANG LHAN CIG ZIM BUR LHUNG BA LAS, ,DNGOS GRUB 'BRAS BU DPAG BSAM LJON SHING PHAN BDE'I 'BRU TSOGS GA-YUR ZAS BSIL GRIB NYON TSAD SKYOB BYED YIN, STON GYI MDZES MA NA CHUD MA, ,SER LJANG SPU TSIMS NAS, ,RDZU 'PHRUL GAR BSGYUR LANG LING DAG ,MTHONG TSE 'JIG RTEN DPE MED SGRA, ,DE 'DRAS BSKRUN BYA NYID MIN PA, ,MKHAS PA RNA BA MGU BA'I GTAM, ,MCHOG GI RING GNAS THUB PA MCHOG ,MDO RGYUD DON DU BRGYUS PA'I NGO MTSAR GYIS, ,DON GNYER KHYE'U CHUD MGUL PA MDZES, ,MI BZAD TSANG TSING STUG PO'I KHROD, ,LOG SMRA LCE GNYIS TSOGS KYIS GANG, ,NANG ZHUGS THAR 'DOD SKYE BO'I DBUGS, ,DBYUNG BYED RTA BDUN GSAR DU @041B BZHAD, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG DBANG BLO BZANG GRAGS, ,SRAS KYI THU BO DGE LEGS DPAL, ,LA SOGS 'DREN BYED BUM BZANG LAS, ,SNYAN GYI YUR BAR BABS PA'I CHU, ,GRUB MCHOG RA HU'I LUGS SROL CHE,
